scripts.start: concurrently "npm run watch-js" "npm run watch-php" "npm run copy-files"
scripts.watch-js: parcel watch template-index.html offline.html template-view.html template-passwordreset.html --no-hmr --public-url ./
scripts.bundle: parcel build template-index.html offline.html template-view.html template-passwordreset.html && npm run copy-files && cpx "src/php/**/{*,.*}" dist
scripts.clear: npm run clear-dist && npm run clear-cache
